aboutus_1: As pioneers in developing programs and unique solutions in the technology sector, management systems and online modern shopping, we are working to launch the first 3D modern virtual city that simulates our reality and meets the requirements of the present, combining social and commercial communication in a modern and entertaining way, relying mainly on the latest technologies and techniques to remain in direct contact with everything new. You will be able to roam the outside world from the comfort of your home!
aboutus_2: One of the most important services provided by Chick Chack city is a 3D virtual mall that contains integrated services of stores, restaurants, and various service centers in which it is marketed through virtual roaming and augmented reality using mobile devices (smart phones) and virtual reality devices (glasses).
contuctus_p: We are pleased for contacting us, and always here to serve you!
privacy_1: - It is the official website for the online store platform.
privacy_2: -  We can be reached via email at info@chickchack.net.
privacy_3: - For every visitor to our webpage on the Internet, you must ensure that our web server does not automatically recognize any domain or email address information. We collect the email addresses of those who contact us via email. The information we collect is used for internal review and then discarded. We use cookies to allow chickchack customers to log into their account.
privacy_4: - If you do not want to receive an email from us in the future, please let us know by sending us an email at the above address. If you provide us with your postal address online, you will only receive the information that you provided us with your address. People who provide us with their phone numbers over the Internet only receive a phone call from us with information regarding requests they have placed online.
privacy_5: - We do not share or have any special relationships with any of the advertising companies. Upon request, we provide website visitors with access to all information [including proprietary information] that we hold about them.
privacy_6: - We have appropriate security measures in place in our physical facilities to protect against the loss, misuse or alteration of the information we have collected from you on our site.
privacy_7: - If you feel that this website is not following the stated information policy, you may contact us at the addresses or phone numbers below.

Likewise, as a courtesy and not as an obligation (contractual or otherwise), fourteen (14) days before the expiration date of the customer's domain, if it is registered with ChickChack (or one of its subsidiaries), or if it has been transferred to Check Chuck (or one of its subsidiaries), ChickChack will automatically renew the customer's domain for the same period specified in the previous payment period, at the current non-promotional price by withdrawing the applicable fees from the payment method originally specified by the customer. a_1: - The idea of 'Chick Chack' is to create a modern  virtual world that combines social and business communication in a modern and entertaining way.
a_11: A virtual three dimensional social marketing complex is designed over the Internet, whereby a tourist, customer or any person from anywhere in the world wanders, to shop by wandering with confidence and relaxation, deals with products and examine them, and observe their data as on reality. Then having the purchase decision through this huge 'mall' through mobile, computer, or Virtual Reality technology.
q_2: What services does Chick Chack provide?
a_2_1_p: a three-dimensional virtual, marketing and social via Internet,    whereby a tourist, customer, or any person from anywhere in the world., to shop by comfortably and confidently, check the product and flip them, examines them and sees their data as in real life to have the decision to purchase through the 'mall' through mobile, computer, VR technology, or through augmented reality technology.
a_2_2_p: It is a modern and functional commercial building that brings together factories and major companies under one roof, specializing in import and export. Where we designed a special building for wholesale trade consisting of a large number of stores that allow factories and large companies to display their products for sale, and the merchant wanders in the complex in search of products from the factories directly, and our customers collect materials and send them by sea or air on demand, where a merchant can collect his products from more than A large factory and company at the lowest prices, thus reducing the hassle of traveling and touring in large complexes.
a_2_2_p1: chick service provides merchants with a 3D display of products with the name of products and minimum order quantities, as on the real world. It would be able to ship full counters and choose the right one for sizing standards shipment.
a_2_2_p2: Chickchack services provide different languages to speak with merchants, so the merchant is only required to select products from factories and place them in a virtual container according to its true capacity and deliver it to anywhere in the world at the lowest possible costs with global customs clearance.
a_2_2_p3: Chickchack offers services where one can speak with representatives of factories to view the latest products and offers on order quantities while processing orders in one click.
a_2_2_p4: Chick Chack aims to Achieve the dream of small shop owners of importing directly from industrialized and producing countries, and obtaining suitable prices to expand their trade. Through the platform, store owners can choose their products and put them in the container in a realistic and real way.
a_2_3_p: سوق شعبي مكون من طابق واحد يتم من خلاله عرض البضائع عن طريق اكشاك، ومن الممكن أن يقوم الشخص بشراء منتجات من تشيك تشاك لتجارة الجملة وبيعها في هذه الاكشاك أو عرض بضائع مستعملة.
a_2_4_p: يعتبر هذا المنتج إما للتوصيل المحلي فقط أو الشحن الدولي أو الاثنين معا، حيث يتم تركيب هذا الرصيف أمام المول أو قاعة الطعام أو تجارة الجملة .. الخ. ويكون متصل مع كبرى شركات الشحن والتوصيل المحلية والعالمية.
a_2_5_p: Organizing real-life simulated exhibitions, holding and organizing an event for any exhibition, conference, meeting, workshops and training courses through this technology where the customer can receive our advanced technologies. We will also stimulate it through an information formula, which is: 'Save your effort and money, and use technology to get the best results and successes and not lose information.
a_2_6_p: This hall specializes in food and beverage services and can be combined with the mall and a charging dock that has express shipping only.
a_2_6_p1: chickchack  provides a platform for restaurants that varies according to the customer's location, as it automatically shows the restaurants close to the customer to deliver the food quickly and hot
a_2_7_p: It specializes in offering all supermarket services in a distinctive way and can be combined with the mall and freight dock.
